about_the_game:
Country Woods Add-on Forest Lake Pack invites creators to the wilderness with new assets that are perfect for any country visit.

This add-on pack features new assets perfect for exploring the woods, farms, forests, mines and natural outdoor settings, camping, or discovering lost treasures hidden deep in a sea of trees. Assets include land and water tiles, multiple tree types including different color of trees based on types and seasons, along with camping assets and fireplaces, and even a treehouse. There are also 28 human character sprites with multiple poses.

Features:

* 12 tile sheets with contents below:
* Tilesets to create lake & river, countryside, cave, and more!
* Autotiles: A1 / A2 / A4 / A5
* Character sets: 28 human sprites with unique movements
* Character animations for campfire, cooler box, burner
* Tree graphic in various colors in PNG file
* "How to setup the tiles" instruction included
*For use in RPG Maker MV or the engine of your choice!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Country Woods Add-on Forest Lake" and "RPG Maker MV - Country Woods Add-on Forest Lake" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!

short_description: Add more fun to your farms, forests, mines and natural outdoor settings with this add-on pack from Kaue Luchetta!
